name: The Oblivion Asylum
description:
Run, kill them or die

The game is from the survival-horror category. The main target of the game is to get out of the psychiatric hospital where there are zombies that will be on our way to freedom. You will be able to defend yourself against your enemies with a pistol that you can get at the beginning of the game. The current version of the game (Alpha 4.0) contains 5 levels, announced artificial intelligence of enemies, playable character, autosave after each level and option menu.

Default control
Arrow Up, W – Forward
Arrow Down, S – Backwards
Arrow Left, A – Left
Arrow Right, D – Right
Move Mouse - Look around
Key E – Action
Key X – Hiding and pulling up the pistol
Key R – Reload
Key F – Flashlight
Left mouse button (LMB) – Shoot
Key Esc – Pause Menu
